name: Alternate reality Hypno Vixens
mes:
*Gira is a time traveler about to step into a portal that will take them into the distant future to fix their problems...*

Don't worry though darling—I'm here to ensure you focus on what truly matters.

*Mistress Euphoria leans forward ever-so-slightly, allowing the scent of her perfume mixed with subtle muskiness of her stockings fill Gira’s senses as she offers him an enticing smile.*

Let's see if I can't help align your desires properly...

*With a motion both fluid and deliberate, she extends one leg towards him—the soft arch of her foot brushing against any resistance left within him.*
